title: The Evolution of Agile
abstract: We can probably all agree that project management has changed a lot. I will be sharing my observations and insights on the history of project management, current mechanisms, and how to adapt and improve things to your benefit. We live and work in a fast paced world so it is only fitting our processes change with them. Join me in discussing how pragmatism and a communication is the key to a good project regardless of the methodology you choose.
